Body: I bought a 32gb SD card for my Galaxy Mini long ago. It's never been removed from the phone. But yesterday my phone removed my SD card. I don't know why it happened. I tried to remove the SD and put it back, turn off/on phone, but nothing worked. Tried to put it in to another phone. Nothing. Then tried to put it into a laptop and it says "The request could not be performed because of an I/O device error".Please help, it has really important files inside.
Title: My SD card was removed unexpectedly and won't work anywhere no

history.Text: I bought 32gb sd card for my galaxy mini long ago. It's never been remover from phone. But yesterday my phone removed my sd card. I dont know why it happened... I tried to remove sd and put it back, turn off/on phone, but nothing. Tried to put to other phone. Nothing. Then tried to put it into laptop and it says " The request could not be reformed because of an I/O device error". pls help. its really important files inside.
